desc: GACHALA SKINCARE Pure, Natural Skincare Products, Eco-Friendly, Biodegradable Beauty Products from the Heart of the Amazon.

layout.text: Introducing our new addition, The Eternal Guasha Knife: Gua means to scrape and Sha means redness or swelling. Therefore, Gua Sha techniques involve the use of instruments to scrape the skin, apply pressure or massage to promote optimal circulation, metabolic processes and energy flow.
